各位同學們好：
113年10月10日國慶日，電腦教室不開放。不便之處，敬請見諒！
圖資處綜合業務業組 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dear students,
The computer lab will be closed on October 10 2024.Sorry for the inconvenience!

Office of Library and Information Services
